section.p: The Gold Dust Tavern is a plush inn besides the city gates. The tavern costs you 1 Shard a day. Each day you spend here, you can recover 1 Stamina point if injured, up to the limit of your normal unwounded Stamina score.

If you want to spend a further 3 Shards buying drinks all round at the bar, and listen for rumours,
turn to 331
